name: Depot
description: A storage location for goods or materials.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Internal unique identifier for the depot.

properties.name: extrernalId
properties.description: The external id of the depot.

properties.name: externalProvider
properties.description: The external provider of the depot.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Physical address or coordinates of the depot.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current operational status of the depot.
